title: ➽Gorgeous Modern Top Floor Cambridge 1 Bedroom! Pet-Friendly!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 267249054', 'Rent: $3,300 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet-Friendly', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Gorgeous Modern Top Floor Cambridge 1 Bedroom Featuring Hardwood Floors, Central Air/Heat, Modern Appliances, Granite Counter Tops, a Dishwasher, Microwave, High Ceilings, Fantastic Natural Light, Great Closet Space, and an In-Unit Washer/Dryer.', 'Right in the Gorgeous Cambridge near the Red Line, Porter Square, Harvard University, the Grocery Store, and Multiple Fantastic Restaurants.', 'Virtual Tour Available!', 'Pet-Friendly', 'Available September!', 'Contact me via email!', 'Crew Fitzpatrick', 'CFB Real Estate powered by Keller Williams', 'Rentals @ CFBRealestate .', 'com', 'Utilities: All Utilities Separate', "Move in Costs: First Month's Rent, Security Deposit (Negotiable), and Broker Fee (No Last Month's Rent Upfront)", 'Thanks for checking out my listing.', "I would love to work with you and find you a fantastic apartment, I offer Boston's largest personalized video database for ease of access!", 'To confirm availability for this unit and to see other great available listings please email me!', 'Bus: CT2 Vassar St @ Pacific St Extension (0.36 mi)', 'Bus: 47 Brookline St @ Pacific St (0.03 mi)', 'Bus: 64 Magazine St @ Perry St (0.16 mi)', 'Bus: 1 Massachusetts Ave @ Sidney St (0.28 mi)', 'Bus: 70 Franklin St @ Sidney St (0.20 mi)', 'Bus: 83 Magazine St @ Green St (0.27 mi)', 'Bus: 91 Magazine St @ Green St (0.27 mi)', 'Subway: Red Line Central (0.28 mi)', 'Bus: 68 Broadway @ Columbia St (0.59 mi)']
